```{r, fig.width=5, fig.height=6, eval= FALSE}
mf_theme("dark")
# data import
mtq <- mf_get_mtq()
# Selection of a target municipality
# to display in the inset
mtq_target <- mtq[c(26),]
# Display the base map
mf_map(mtq)
# display the target 
# on the main map
mf_map(mtq_inset, add = T, col = "tomato")
# open the inset
mf_inset_on(x = mtq_target, pos = "topright", 
            cex = .4)
# center on on the target munucipality
mf_init(mtq_inset)
# display all municipalities
mf_map(mtq, add = T)
# display the target municipality
mf_map(mtq_inset, add = T, col = "tomato")
# display a label
mf_label(mtq_inset, var = "LIBGEO", 
         col = "black")
# display a scale bar
mf_scale(size = 2)
# close the inset
mf_inset_off()
# display the map layout of  
# the main map
mf_layout()
```
